# Checklists

## Developers

- [ ] I have documented the Summary section
- [ ] I have documented the QA section
- [ ] I have manually tested the QA scenarios locally
- [ ] I have requested reviewers
- [ ] I have addressed the feedback
- [ ] I have cleaned up the commit history

## Reviewers

- [ ] I have manually tested the QA scenarios locally
- [ ] I have statically reviewed the code, submitted my comments, and possibly requested changes
- [ ] I have verified that all comments have been addressed
